name: fortinet-forticnp
label: Fortinet FortiCNP
description: Fortinet FortiCNP integrates with APIs provided by cloud vendors including AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud Platform to monitor and track all security components, including configurations, user activity, and traffic flow logs. This Connector automated operations such as retrieving the get alerts from Fortinet FortiCNP, etc

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: URL of the Fortinet FortiCNP API

fields.title: API Key
fields.name: api_key
fields.description: FortiCNP Credential, follow this link to generate it https://docs.fortinet.com/document/FortiCNP/21.1.0/online-help/585481/generate-credential

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get Account Severity Level
operations.description: Retrieves the severity level of each cloud service account from Fortinet FortiCNP.

operations.title: Get Alert Severities
operations.description: Retrieves all the alert severities from Fortinet FortiCNP.

operations.title: Get Resource Map
operations.description: Retrieves the basic information for users and accounts from Fortinet FortiCNP.

operations.title: Get Resource List
operations.description: Get Resource List is a key API to retrieve a complete list of cloud resource details.

parameters.title: Filter JSON
parameters.name: filter
parameters.tooltip: Specify the filter json that you want to retrieve from Fortinet FortiCNP. Filter json in the format of [{"key": "<resource platform>", "option": [{"key": "<resource type>" } ] } ] }
parameters.description: Specify the filter json that you want to retrieve from Fortinet FortiCNP. e.g [{"key": "GoogleCloud", "option": [{"key": "Compute Engine Instance" } ] } ] }

parameters.title: Records to Skip
parameters.name: skip
parameters.tooltip: Specify the first X records that you want to skip while retrieving response from Fortinet FortiCNP.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the first X records that you want to skip while retrieving response from Fortinet FortiCNP.

parameters.title: Limit Fetched Records To
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of records that you want this operation to fetch from Fortinet FortiCNP.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of records that you want this operation to fetch from Fortinet FortiCNP

parameters.title: Order By
parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.tooltip: The filter options for the return resource list, available options: ID, Region, Resource Type and Risk Level
parameters.description: The filter options for the return resource list, available options: ID, Region, Resource Type and Risk Level

parameters.title: Order Direction
parameters.name: orderDirection
parameters.tooltip: The order of the returned resource list, it can be ascending order or descending order.
parameters.description: The order of the returned resource list, it can be ascending order or descending order.

operations.title: Get Resource Details
operations.description: Retrieve details of a specific cloud resource from Fortinet FortiCNP

parameters.title: Resource ID
parameters.name: resourceid
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Resource ID whose details you want to retrieve from Fortinet FortiCNP.
parameters.description: Specify the Resource ID whose details you want to retrieve from Fortinet FortiCNP.

operations.title: Get Alerts
operations.description: Retrieves alerts of all the accounts from Fortinet FortiCNP that are filtered based on the time range of the alerts you want to retrieve and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Start Time
parameters.name: start_time
parameters.tooltip: Select the Start DateTime from when you want to retrieve alerts (oldest alerts) from Fortinet FortiCNP.
parameters.description: Select the Start DateTime from when you want to retrieve alerts (oldest alerts) from Fortinet FortiCNP.

parameters.title: End Time
parameters.name: end_time
parameters.tooltip: Select the End DateTime till when you want to retrieve alerts (most recent alerts) from Fortinet FortiCNP.
parameters.description: Select the End DateTime till when you want to retrieve alerts (most recent alerts) from Fortinet FortiCNP.

parameters.title: Alert ID
parameters.name: alert_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the alert ID whose details you want to retrieve from Fortinet FortiCNP.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the alert ID whose details you want to retrieve from Fortinet FortiCNP.

parameters.title: User
parameters.name: alert_user
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify one or multiple users (CSV format if you are specifying multiple users) based on whom you want to retrieve alerts from Fortinet FortiCNP.
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify one or multiple users (CSV format if you are specifying multiple users) based on whom you want to retrieve alerts from Fortinet FortiCNP.

parameters.title: Severity
parameters.name: severity
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify one or multiple severities (CSV format if you are specifying multiple severities) based on which you want to retrieve alerts from Fortinet FortiCNP.
parameters.tooltip: Specify one or multiple severities (CSV format if you are specifying multiple severities) based on which you want to retrieve alerts from Fortinet FortiCNP.

parameters.title: State
parameters.name: alert_state
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify one or multiple states (CSV format if you are specifying multiple states) based on which you want to retrieve alerts from Fortinet FortiCNP.
parameters.tooltip: Specify one or multiple states (CSV format if you are specifying multiple states) based on which you want to retrieve alerts from Fortinet FortiCNP.

parameters.title: Records to Skip
parameters.name: skip
parameters.tooltip: Specify the first X records that you want to skip while retrieving alerts from Fortinet FortiCNP.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the first X records that you want to skip while retrieving alerts from Fortinet FortiCNP.

parameters.title: Limit Fetched Records To
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of records that you want this operation to fetch from Fortinet FortiCNP. The maximum number of records that can be retrieved is 1000.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of records that you want this operation to fetch from Fortinet FortiCNP. The maximum number of records that can be retrieved is 1000.

parameters.title: File ID
parameters.name: fileId
parameters.tooltip: File ID of the document under monitoring in FortiCNP - File ID can be obtained through the response variable objectId from Get Alert by Filter action, When the response variable objectType in the "Get Alerts" API response is of type "Document"
parameters.description: File ID of the document under monitoring in FortiCNP - File ID can be obtained through the response variable objectId from Get Alert by Filter. When the response variable objectType in the "Get Alerts" API response is of type "Document", the objectId is also the file ID. Other types of objectType cannot use objectId as the file ID.
